metadata.title: CVE-2012-3522 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in contrib/langwiz.php in GeSHibefore 1.0.8.11 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script orHTML via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-3522` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-geshi - 1.0.8.11-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: geshi package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.8.11-2').
